asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling medium close-up portrait of a dwarf. He has scraggly red hair, red-rimmed eyes, and a wide, toothless smile that is deeply unsettling. He is looking up at the viewer from a low angle. The scene is illuminated by a faint, ominous red glow in a dark tunnel, creating a creepy atmosphere. The overall style emphasizes his grimy appearance and disturbing expression.
